name: get_calendar_events
description: Get family calendar events from Google Calendar. Aggregates events from all synced calendars including kids' sports schedules (GameChanger, SportsEngine, TeamSnap, etc.), custody calendar ('The Kids' with Mom/Dad days), and family events. Detects scheduling conflicts and can filter by family member.

start_date.description: Start date for custom range (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD). Only used if time_range is 'custom'.

end_date.description: End date for custom range (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD). Only used if time_range is 'custom'.

max_results.description: Maximum number of events to return (default: 25)

family_member.description: Filter events to a specific family member (e.g., 'Jack', 'Anna'). Leave empty for all family members.

group_by.description: How to group results: 'day' (by date), 'member' (by family member), or null for chronological list

include_custody.description: Whether to highlight custody schedule (Mom/Dad days). Default: true

check_conflicts.description: Whether to detect and warn about scheduling conflicts. Default: true
